tests.description: Verify that the user can access the Plans section from the bottom navigation to view available bundles.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is on the Home screen
When the user taps on the Plans tab
Then the Plans screen should be displayed
  And bundle categories such as Local, Roaming, Monthly, Weekly, and Daily should be visible

tests.description: Verify that all purchasable bundles appear with correct information and a Buy button, aligned with business rules.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is on the Plans screen
When the bundles list loads
Then all purchasable bundles should be displayed with correct allowances, validity, and price
And each bundle should display a Buy button

tests.description: Verify that tapping a bundle opens a detail view showing bundle allowances, validity, and price before proceeding to purchase.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is viewing the bundles list
When the user taps on a bundle
Then a detail view should open displaying all allowances, validity period, and price
  And a Buy action should be available

tests.description: Verify that the purchase completes successfully when the user has enough balance, and the confirmation screen is shown.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user has sufficient credit
  And the user opens the bundle detail view
When the user confirms the purchase
Then the purchase should be successful
  And the user should see a confirmation screen with the purchased bundle details

tests.description: Verify that users with insufficient balance are prevented from purchasing and are shown an appropriate warning.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user has insufficient credit
  And the user attempts to buy a bundle
Then the system should block the purchase
  And an insufficient credit message should be displayed
  And the user should be prompted to recharge

tests.summary: Display active privilege bundle on Home
tests.description: Verify that the Home screen displays the user's active privilege bundle with remaining allowances and renewal information.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is subscribed to an Ooredoo Family privilege bundle
When the Home screen loads
Then the privilege bundle should be displayed with remaining Internet, Minutes, and SMS
  And the renewal information should be visible

tests.summary: Privilege bundle details in Usage section
tests.description: Verify that the Usage section shows full details of the active privilege bundle according to business rules.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is on the Home screen
When the user selects the option to view usage details
Then the Usage section should display the active privilege bundle and its remaining allowances

tests.description: Verify that the user can navigate backward from Plans, bundle detail views, and usage screens without losing state.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is navigating through Plans or Usage screens
When the user taps the back button
Then the user should return to the previous screen
  And no data or selections should be lost

tests.description: Verify that privilege bundles are displayed only for information and cannot be purchased, changed, or cancelled as per business rules.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user views their privilege bundle
When privilege bundle information is displayed
Then no Buy or modification option should be available
And the privilege bundle should be treated as non-purchasable
